Practical ML for Developing Countries Workshop @ ICLR 2022,
Learning under limited/low resource scenarios. Virtual
Formatting and Submission Guidelines
HOME CALL FOR PAPERS DATES ORGANIZERS

Formatting and Submission Guidelines

To support the new authors on the submission and formatting process, we are providing short guidelines.

Important steps

  • Download the ICLR template
  • Make submission edits on the file iclr2022_conference.tex template
  • Optionally make edits after uploading the ICLR template files to overleaf
  • Finally submit the anonymized pdf format of your paper to CMT PML4DC

Addtional Information

  • Authors new to LaTeX may refer here for local installation and usage of LaTeX.

  • For LaTeX use on overleaf please refer here.

PML4DC@ICLR2022 is maintained by the PML4DC Organizers. This page is hosted on Github using GitHub Pages.
